name: 林祐正
objective: The course introduces the major concepts and methods for project management and disaster prevention in construction. Furthermore, this course also provides the management skills and knowledge related to construction management and disaster prevention. Through the introduction of practical cases, students can combine it with practice and effectively apply it to the construction projects. Project management knowledge and skills are applied to construction project management and disaster prevention for project management.
schedule:
Major topics of this course
1. Introduction to construction management
2. Introduction to disaster prevention for project management
3. The concepts for construction management
4. The methods for construction management
5. The practical skills for project plan and management
6. The applications of AI for construction management 
7. The Special Topic for construction management and disaster prevention
8. Case Study for construction management and disaster prevention
consultation: Use e-mail to confirm the time for discussion.
